messages.message:
@Aaron Tami @Jonathan Shih We ran into a strange OCR error msg when using microsoft ocr to process documents for Moodyâ€™s POC:

```'clockwiseOrientation'. Image: ib_solutions/solutions/fs/Instabase Drive/poc/moodys/ADM/Balaram/Marx/run_kerry/2019-11-19-02:24:56/c1bf5eb5-4234-4285-815e-7f17a5936899/out/s1_process_files/images/Ageas SA:NV.pdf_p1.jpg```
The input document is here https://www.instabase.com/ib_solutions/solutions/fs/Instabase%20Drive/poc/moodys/ADM/Balaram/Marx/clockwise-error/
The test flow I used is
https://www.instabase.com/apps/flow/edit/ib_solutions/solutions/fs/Instabase%20Drive/poc/moodys/ADM/kerry-test/workflows/test-flow.ibflow#
The output is at
https://www.instabase.com/ib_solutions/solutions/fs/Instabase%20Drive/poc/moodys/ADM/Balaram/Marx/run_kerry/2019-11-19-02:24:56/c1bf5eb5-4234-4285-815e-7f17a5936899/out/
You can see the error message at `batch.ibflowresults`
(cc @Balaram)
It seems like we don't handle empty pages well with microsoft, i have a fix for this
